entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Beaver Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Creek Airport 12:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
